title: Scripter in Ranked Match
body:
I have the clip of a Yasuo {{champion:157}} player throwing a wind wall up when he had no vision of me, Heimerdinger {{champion:74}} . I reviewed the gameplay at 31:50 to 31:55 and saw that he had NO vision. He threw his wind seconds before even placing his ward. The players name is Smurfboard . If there is any way I can post the clip here of the scripter, I would be more than happy doing so. Please get back to me soon about how to post the clip, or if you are able to check my last ranked game please go to 31:50 to see for yourself.

Thanks,
Longdarkranger

PS: Nerf ohmwrecker

replies.body: Were you able to report him in post-game? That's the best way to make sure we've got logs of what happened and when to have some sort of proof to work with.
Yes, I reported him post game. I also figured out how to view the saved video as well. It was my last ranked match on 10/10/17. Hopefully you're able to view the logs and review the game footage.
